history.narrative: Law 19-167, the “Youth Bullying Prevention Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-743. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 1, 2012, and June 5, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 22, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-384 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-167 became effective on Sept. 14, 2012.
